definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
Don't spread abroad the shame of the family, don't believe rumors lightly. (idiom)/Don't wash your dirty linen in public, don't listen to others' gossip.
pinyin: jia1 chou3 bu4 ke3 wai4 chuan2 , liu2 yan2 qie4 mo4 qing1 xin4
containing_words.word: 家醜不可外傳，流言切莫輕信

sentences.english: She has practised upon my credulity with huge success.
sentences.chinese: 她利用了我的輕信大獲成功。

sentences.english: He is too ingenuous in believing what people say.
sentences.chinese: 他太天真，輕信別人的話。

sentences.english: He has practised on my credulity.
I was once Dr. Fang's ally and supporter because I had been naive enough to just simply take his words.
sentences.chinese: 我曾是方舟子的支持者與同伴，因爲幼稚到輕信人言。

sentences.english: Am I supposed to swallow that story?
sentences.chinese: 你們認爲我會輕信那個故事嗎？

sentences.english: What use were anger and protestations against her silly credulity?
sentences.chinese: 對於她那樣癡心的輕信，憤怒和抗議又有什麼用呢？

sentences.english: The weak and trusting character of Solon plunged Athens into slavery.
sentences.chinese: 梭倫軟弱和輕信的特點使雅典人淪爲奴隸。

sentences.english: It's no wonder the Chinese spend their time laughing at the gullibility of certain westerners.
sentences.chinese: 難怪中國要嘲笑某些西方人的輕信。

sentences.english: Only a credulous person would fall for that old trick.
sentences.chinese: 只有輕信的人才會被那個陳舊的騙局騙倒。

sentences.english: You should have a try, don't swallow anybody.
sentences.chinese: 不要輕信任何人，你得親自去試一試。

sentences.english: Was he greedy, or gullible, or stubbornly blind to the truth?
sentences.chinese: 還是他貪心，過於輕信或者頑固地對事實視而不見？

sentences.english: She is too ingenuous in believing what others say.
sentences.chinese: 她太天真，輕信別人的話。

sentences.english: The manager of the bank was credulous individual named Mr. Fish.
sentences.chinese: 銀行經理稱“魚先生，”是個輕信的人。

sentences.english: Scarcely can be credulous those results that had included about written examination, want to rely on oneself.
sentences.chinese: 一定不能輕信那些關於筆試包過的答案，要靠自己。

sentences.english: Credulous people are easily misled by false advertisements.
sentences.chinese: 輕信的人很容易上虛假廣告的當。
